name: The way of the Damned
description:
[Intro]

You are the Damned One - the one who sold his soul to a powerful demon. In return, the demon promised to provide an opportunity to avenge the murder of the Damned One family. Revenge has been accomplished, but in return, Damned One must help his new master destroy other higher demons.

[Main Mechanic] [not realized:( ]

At the end of each floor, after defeating a guardian or boss, you need to spend from 1 to 3 health points, and buy new abilities or weapons for your health.
